17 446 1,627 43 549 2,622 Grand Total 2,452 2,439 657 5,548 131 492 192 815 1,691 2,449 1,184 5,324 4,274 5,380 2,033 11,687   ## p. 658 (#682) ############################################    ## p. 659 (#683) ############################################  Appendix 24 Combat Losses in the Mediterranean Theater of Operations June 1942 to May 1945 Heavy Bomber Med/Lt Bomber Fighter All Types Aircraft AA Other Total Aircraft AA Other Total Aircraft AA Other Total Aircraft AA Other Total 1942 Jun 4 1 Jul 3 Aug 1 Sep Oct 1 Nov 1 Dec Total 12 22 …………224 2 2 1162. 531 11347 1 4 1 17 9 5 1 15 1262145 43 1 5 3 3 3 5 1 6 - 6 6 205w 3 6 6 10 30 46 448 4 14 11 7 18 4 34 8 54 125 32 10 67 17 2 2280 42 86 1943 Jan 11 11 11 1 1 13 78 Feb 6 6 14 10 4 28 40 10 42 69 88888 100 52 60 Mar 2 2 8 5 · 13 55 7 6 68 65 12 Apr 11 May 12 Jun 8 Jul 16 2429 13 24 10 5 39 109 4 3 116 144 16 8 16 18 3 4 25 89 16 11 116 119 72222 5 112 20 6 86 6 83 168 23 15 157 10 · 18 2 6 26 58 3 20 81 84 7 26 117 5 30 49 22 2 73 112 12 29 153 177 43 36 256 Aug 41 31 13 85 27 12 2 41 113 17 27 157 181 60 42 283 Sep 15 1 4 Oct 32 2 3 Nov 25 1 2 Dec 30 3 3 Total 209 55 30 294 239 22072 25222 32 6 17 55 56 5 27 88 103 12 48 163 1 10 33 32 6 12 50 86 9 25 120 4 7 20 18 15 6 39 52 20 15 87 4 8 19 56 14 10 80 93 21 21 135 80 66 385 816 115 157 1,088 1,264 250 253 1,767 1944 Jan 20 10 24 54 Feb 106 11 11 128 12 Mar 42 19 24 85 Apr May Jun 105 65 24 194 10 2 50 107 18 175 85 79 32 196 ∞2×8 15 7 50 70 17 30 117 118 42 61 221 19 5 36 57 25 22 104 175 55 38 268 8 13 7 28 38 9 42 89 88 41 73 202 - 12 38 17 50 105 153 84 74 311 · 23 9 32 52 59 69 180 102 189 96 387 9 12 1 22 67 70 64 201 161 161 97 419 Jul 94 170 53 317 4 10 7 21 43 42 50 135 141 222 Aug 91 112 51 254 3 20 13 36 39 54 104 Sep 7 71 16 94 8 12 2 22 18 197 55 44 117 110 473 133 186 168 487 33 138 62 233 Oct 110 30 140 4 18 3 25 2 55 41 98 6 183 74 263 Nov 1 69 62 132 12 14 3 29 10 54 56 120 23 137 121 281 Dec 18 110 77 205 3 5 3 11 7 36 Total 619 933 422 1,974 1
